result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin R. Coyle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Per Wisconsin Statute, funds from prison accounts may be used for obligations in accordance with prison policy not to exceed 25% of gross.

Proposed Stipulation and Order for Jail Credit filed by the State (failed to be sent to Judge for signature)
**AMENDED**
Revoked - Sentenced to County Jail/HOC

Defendant Justin R. Coyle in court with Attorney (Atty) Jared Redfield. Defendant Justin R. Coyle in custody. Prosecuting Assistant District Attorney (ADA) Robert J Jambois appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Cases heard at this time are 16CF-168 and 16CM-152.

3:35 PM Court calls cases.
Atty Jambois states appearances.

Matters are set for a sentence after revocation hearing.
This is a joint stipulated recommendation.

Atty Redfield concurs with statement by the State.
Both counsel have received the revocation packet. Neither party has any corrections to state.

Court questions Defendant.
Discussions continue.
Court has reviewed the revocation packet, is referred to.

Atty Jambois addresses the Court prior to sentencing.
Atty Redfield addresses the Court prior to sentencing.

State addresses current open cases that Defendant has. 
Defendant addresses the Court prior to sentencing.

Court has a number of factors to consider to determine sentencing.

16CF-168:
Count 2:
Jail sentence for 8 months.
Jail credit for 107 days unless Atty Redfield provides to Atty Jambois rational indicating that additional time is due. If the State and Defense cannot agree, they can come back to the Court.
If Defendant owes costs and surcharges, to be reduced to a civil judgment.

Count 3:
Jail sentence for 8 months.
Jail credit for 107 days unless Atty Redfield provides to Atty Jambois rational indicating that additional time is due. If the State and Defense cannot agree, they can come back to the Court.
Concurrent to Count 2.
If Defendant owes costs and surcharges, to be reduced to a civil judgment.

16CM-152:
Count 1:
Jail sentence for 8 months.
Jail credit for 107 days unless Atty Redfield provides to Atty Jambois rational indicating that additional time is due. If the State and Defense cannot agree, they can come back to the Court.
Concurrent to 16CF-168.
If Defendant owes costs and surcharges, to be reduced to a civil judgment.

Count 2:
Jail sentence for 8 months.
Jail credit for 107 days unless Atty Redfield provides to Atty Jambois rational indicating that additional time is due. If the State and Defense cannot agree, they can come back to the Court.
Concurrent to Count 1 and Concurrent to 16CF-168.
If Defendant owes costs and surcharges, to be reduced to a civil judgment.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Justin R. Coyle
Current: 123 Beach Street, Plainfield, WI 54966 United States  (Effective: 09-13-2017)
Prior: 2827 Soo Marie Ave, Stevens Point, WI 54481 United States

Defendant Justin R. Coyle in court with attorney David Paul Frank Templeton. Defendant Justin R. Coyle in custody. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Cases heard today are 16CF168, 16CM159, 16CM153, 16CM152 & 15CT264.

11:21 a.m.  Court calls case and states the appearances.
Court has been handed an amended information.
Defense attorney waives further reading of the amended information.

Plea questionnaire/Agreement filed.
Prosecutor states plea agreement.
Attorney for Defendant concurs with agreement stated.

Defendant enters a plea of: 
16CF168:
Count 1 (amended) - No contest 
Count 2 - No contest
Count 3 - No contest
Count 4 - DRI

16CM159:
Count 1 - No contest
Count 2 - DRI

16CM153:
Count 1 - DRI
Count 2 - DRI

16CM152:
Count 1 - No contest
Count 2 - No contest 

15CT264:
Count 1 - DRI

Court approves of the filing of the Amended Information.
Court questions Defendant regarding plea.
Court informs Defendant of Constitutional Rights. Court advises Defendant of Elements State must prove for the Charge.
Court questions Attorney for Defendant.
Court finds Defendant's Plea is freely, voluntarily and intelligently made.
Attorneys stipulate that there is factual basis for the charge(s).

BY THE COURT:
Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charge(s).
Court finds the defendant guilty on Count's 1, 2 & 3 on 16CF168, Count 1 of 16CM159 and Count 1 & 2 on 16CM152 and Count 4 of 16CF168 is DRI, Count 2 of 16CM159 is DRI, Count 1 & 2 on 16CM153 and Count 1 on 15CT264.  Clerk directed to enter Judgment of Conviction this date.

Atty Cousins makes sentencing arguments to the Court. 
Atty Templeton makes sentencing arguments to the Court. 
State has complied with the victim notification; Atty Cousins states that there is no victim impact statements or victim's in the courtroom today.
Defendant makes a statement prior to sentencing.

BY THE COURT:
16CF168:
Count 1 (amended) - 
*120 day jail sentence
*Huber priveleges allowed for work, counseling or any other reason the sheriff will allow
*57 days jail credit 
*Pay costs/surcharges (DNA)

Count 2 -
Sentence withheld
**Placed on Probation for 36 months:
*AODA & comply with treatment recommendations and comply. 
*Complete a Mental Health Evaluation or Psychological Evaluation and comply with recommendations.
*No Violent or Abusive Contact with Theresa Reyes.
*Obtain a DL
*Obtain and maintain full time employment
*Participate in any counseling as recommended by the agent.
*Pay costs/surcharges  (DNA)

Count 3 -
Sentence withheld
**Placed on Probation for 36 months concurrent with Count 2 
*Comply with conditions in Count 2
*Pay costs/surcharges (DNA/Domestic Abuse)

Count 4 - DRI

16CM159:
Count 1 - 
Sentence withheld
**Placed on Probation for 36 months Concurrent with Count 2 & 3 of 16CF168
*Comply with conditions in Count 2 & 3 of 16CF168
*Pay costs/surcharges (DNA)

Count 2 - DRI

16CM153:
Count 1 - DRI
Count 2 - DRI

16CM152:
Count 1 - 
Sentence withheld
**Placed on Probation for 36 months concurrent with Count 1 & 2 on 16CF168 and Count 1 of 16CM159
*Comply with conditions in Count 16CF168 and 16CM159
*Pay costs/surcharges (DNA)

Count 2 -
Sentence withheld
**Placed on Probation for 36 months concurrent with Count 1 & 2 on 16CF168 and Count 1 of 16CM159 and Count 1 of 16CM152
*Comply with conditions in Count 1 and 16CF168 and 16CM159
*Pay costs/surcharges (DNA)
